Tag_Youmay.description: a weekly contract | [[Red Sea]], the sea

General_Description: '''A Red Sea''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "The ocean is infested by [[Sparta]]n [[ship]]s. Clear the sea so [[Athens|our]] [[Athenian navy|fleet]] can safely sail the [[Aegean Sea|Aegean]]."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and destroyed a number of Spartan [[penteconter]]s and [[trireme]]s, and slew Spartan [[soldier]]s, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
